title: Windowseat Studio
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


I am looking for someone to takeover my contract starting from Jan 2021. It’s a studio room located 15 mins from Central London (Zone 2), Scape Mile End, right opposite Queen Mary University. The price is 245 p/w, all bills included.
Includes: private toilet and shower
Private kitchen
Desk top workspace with drawer unit and bookcase
Soft window seat perfect for reading and studying
Desk chair
Coat hook

And all the other necessary facilities. The building itself is fully renovated and good-looking, with a perfect location near the canal. 
https://www.scape.com/en-uk/student-accommodation/london/mile-end/standard
